Description:
Job Description & ResponsibilitiesThe Steel Structure Superintendent will be responsible for all day-to-day Steel Structure activities in his working area from planning till the completion of the job.The Steel Structure Superintendent will work with the subcontractor and AP team to finish the job Safely, on Budget and with the required Quality.The Electrical Supervisor require to following skills and qualifications:Excellent construction site management skills
Have a thorough knowledge and proven ability in construction and erection techniques with emphasis on HV electrical including HV motors, switchgear and transformers, MV electrical equipment and LV electrical and building services including small power and lighting.
Knowledge of CENELEC, IEC, NEC and BS and International electrical Codes. 
Knowledge of KSA electrical standards
Have a thorough knowledge of the international industry codes and standards related to intrinsically safe systems and electrical
Team Player
Strong communicator written and oral
Strong and effective coordinator
Organized, disciplined, able to perform under pressure and manage multiple priorities and parallel tasks
Strong Microsoft software skills, particularly Excel
Report writing skills
Experience of working in a multicultural project team
KSA experienceJob Details
